BillingAccountContact.name: BillingAccountContact
BillingAccountContact.description: Represents a junction between Billing Account objects and Contact objects.

BillingAccountId.description: The Billing Account associated with the Contact.

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Billing Account.

RelationshipEndDate.description: The date when the relationship between the Contact and Billing Account ends.

RelationshipStartDate.description: The date when the relationship between Contact and Billing Account starts.

RelationshipType.description: Specifies the role of the Contact associated with the Billing Account.
